item.description: CDC Checlists Checklists from CDC [University of Michigan Health System] (https://www.uofmhealth.org/health-library/hw251065#te4698) Pathways [Pathways.org Checklist] (https://pathways.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/milestoneschecklist_updated.pdf) Healthychildren.org This resource contains a helpful section Developmental health watch under each age category Help Me Grow Encouraging Healthy development [Healthy development articles] (https://helpmegrowmn.org/HMG/HelpfulRes/Articles/index.html) Intervention A good resource on [when intervention is needed] (https://helpmegrowmn.org/HMG/GetHelpChild/WhyRefer/index.html)
